author: petehatz
title: Online cardano store for SPO's
description: There is no single spot to find good gear 2 market for SPO's, or anything cardano. A central hub to Cardano gear for all! With deals 4 SPO's
solution: I intend to rent a space and finance, a t-shirts/mugs printing press. Eventually as i grow, look to purchase new machines for new products.
experience: I have printed shirts in the past for a small online company as well as mugs. Looking to find same machines for printing.
